document_data.name: Melarvyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Melarvyn''' was a doorguard for [[Haelithtorntowers]], the home of Lady [[Joysil Ambrur]] in [[Marsember]], [[Cormyr]], in the late 14{{th}} centur [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was quite long-winded with words, and had an active, suspicious mind.
document_data.Possessions: One of his bracers could be used to ring a gong.
document_data.Activities: He watched the door for Lady Joysil Ambrur, under the supervision of the steward [[Elward Daunthideir]].
document_data.History: Melarvyn refused entry to [[Roldro Tattershar]] in the {{yearlinkName|1373}}; he summoned the steward, Elward, when Roldro refused to leave. After Roldro threatened the steward with revealing his secrets, he was granted permission to enter; Melarvyn wondered if the steward would let him live after what he'd witnessed.
